hero.title: Being Human 101
hero.subtitle: The Complete Roadmap to Inner Work
hero.tagline: A transformative journey into the depths of your consciousness. Heal core wounds, integrate shadow aspects, and master reality creation.

about.title: About Inner Ascend
about.intro: We are a couple dedicated to the evolution of human consciousness. We spent years researching and experimenting with inner work, transforming our own lives through deep healing and conscious development.
about.description: We believe these tools should be accessible to everyone. We teach complete methodologies for transformation. We provide roadmaps for moving from unconscious patterns to conscious creation. Every practice we share comes from our direct experience healing core wounds, integrating shadow aspects, and mastering reality creation.

experience.title: Monthly Membership
experience.subtitle: What you'll receive in this transformative program

roles.title: Identify and Integrate Core Wounds
roles.description: Stop unconsciously repeating patterns. Learn to identify and integrate your core wounds instead of being driven by them.

roles.title: Reclaim Shadow Aspects
roles.description: Discover and integrate disowned shadow aspects that drive self-sabotage and projection.

roles.title: Clear Ancestral Patterns
roles.description: Transform ancestral patterns that limit what you believe is possible for someone 'like you'.

roles.title: Transform Subconscious Programming
roles.description: Clear subconscious programming from childhood and cultural conditioning that shapes your reality.

roles.title: Master Reality Creation
roles.description: Learn the language of reality creation through conscious expression and intentional manifestation.

roles.title: Quantum Consciousness
roles.description: Develop quantum consciousness for deliberate timeline shifting and manifestation.

investment.title: Why This Work Matters Now
investment.subtitle: The evolutionary threshold
investment.description: We are at an evolutionary threshold. The old ways of being—unconscious, reactive, driven by fear—are no longer sustainable. We need a critical mass of humans operating from healed, integrated consciousness. Inner work is the most essential contribution you can make to humanity's future. Every person who transforms their wounds into wisdom becomes a beacon of possibility for others.
